title: (Tues Early Bird) Morgan2's Millennial Movie Review: Beetlejuice + Would You Buy A Murder House Flip? + Mailbag: Bride In A Dilemma With Bridesmaid
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Morgan2's Millennial Movie Review: Beetlejuice + Would You Buy A Murder House Flip? + Mailbag: Bride In A Dilemma With Bridesmaid
description:
Morgan2 watched 'Bettlejuice' for the first time for the Millennial Movie Review! She shares her thoughts on the movie and if it put her in the Halloween spirit. Plus, we talk about the new show 'Muder House Flip,' and if we would buy a house where someone got murdered. Mailbag: Our listener's wedding is coming up and she found out one of her bridesmaids broke her leg and is in a cast and can hardly walk down the aisle... we give her advice if she should kick her out of the wedding or not.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
